name: Ogre
firstNightReminder: The Ogre points to a player.
ability: On your 1st night, choose a player (not yourself): you become their alignment (you don't know which) even if drunk or poisoned.

jinxes.reason: If the Recluse registers as evil to the Ogre, the Ogre learns that they are evil.
The Spy registers as evil to the Ogre.
If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Ogre, they can't turn good due to their own ability.
The Demon cannot have the Ogre ability.
